name: Deep Dive (Catalyst Games)
description:
Deep Dive is a first person survival game where you need to survive and repair your submarine at the bottom of the ocean. 

Collect and craft items to help you explore the seafloor and try not to drown! 

Credits: 
Aiden Gyory - Producer and Scrum Master 
Lachlan Hansford - Vision Holder and Lead Designer 
Bradley Richards - Level Design

Domenico Mandica - Lead Programmer
